title: KINEEMA / LAZARETH CALL
description: Here you can complete TASK.call_station_lazareth and get mocked by Nix Gottlieb.

dialogueTree.title: Alice: ""It will take just a moment, office..."
dialogueTree.text: "It will take just a moment, officer..."

links.title: Alice: "Her voices fades out into the famil..."
links.text: Her voices fades out into the familiar radio static.

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Gottlieb. What is it now?" There's..."
links.text: "Gottlieb. What is it now?" There's not the slightest hint of wanting to know the answer in that familiar raspy voice.

links.title: You: ""You know who I am?""
links.text: "You know who I am?"

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Yes, there's no end to the misfort..."
links.text: "Yes, there's no end to the misfortunes fate has seen fit to rain upon me."

links.title: You: ""Good fortune, you mean good fortun..."
links.text: "Good fortune, you mean good fortune, right? You're basking in the floodlight of my glory."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Basking in your glory, yeah. Pract..."
links.text: "Basking in your glory, yeah. Practically drowning in it. Please, tell me what your complaint is before I am completely submerged."

links.title: You: ""Yes, we live in difficult times. B..."
links.text: "Yes, we live in difficult times. But at least it's over. Almost over, that is..."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""For you it probably is. I'm counti..."
links.text: "For you it probably is. I'm counting on my lungs outliving your liver by a wide margin." He pauses. "Not that that's anything to fÃªte."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Was he speaking about his longer li..."
links.text: Was he speaking about his longer life or your shorter one when he said it was no cause for celebration?

links.title: Empathy: "A bit of both. But don't flatter yo..."
links.text: A bit of both. But don't flatter yourself -- he's not sorry for you.

links.title: Empathy: "Don't flatter yourself -- he's not..."
links.text: Don't flatter yourself -- he's not going to miss you.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry I've been such a bother..."
links.text: "I'm sorry I've been such a bother to you..."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Oh, spare me the sad drunken blubb..."
links.text: "Oh, spare me the sad drunken blubbering and get on with it. What's your complaint?"

links.title: You: ""I don't know anything about fate...."
links.text: "I don't know anything about fate. I just wanted to talk about a medical issue."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Then let's get on with it. Clock i..."
links.text: "Then let's get on with it. Clock is ticking."

links.title: You: ""Sure, sure -- but can you tell me..."
links.text: "Sure, sure -- but can you tell me about myself? As in, who I am?"

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""*Who* you are? You lost your human..."
links.text: "*Who* you are? You lost your human visage a while back. Now let's get on with it -- I've got more important things to do."

links.title: You: ""Yes, it's Firewalker here.""
links.text: "Yes, it's Firewalker here."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Firewalker? Yes, yes you are. Just..."
links.text: "Firewalker? Yes, yes you are. Just don't breathe in the general direction of your fire-feet. Actually, wait..."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""...do exactly that. Put yourself o..."
links.text: "...do exactly that. Put yourself out of your misery. Take a deep diaphragmatic breath in and..." You hear an exaggerated inhale and a long exhale on the other end of the line.

links.title: Endurance: "The firewalker cannot die."
links.text: The firewalker cannot die.

links.title: Conceptualization: "It would be an artistic statement o..."
links.text: It would be an artistic statement of some kind or another.

links.title: Inland Empire: "A glorious sight: your body, tired..."
links.text: A glorious sight: your body, tired from the vastness of the visions that haunt it,  burning up in a flame fed by your own living breath.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Self-immolation has been all the ra..."
links.text: Self-immolation has been all the rage in Lo Manthang for a while now, especially among university students. It is particularly popular in Co Hoi, where such acts get the most press.

links.title: You: "But why?"
links.text: But why?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Young religious people protesting t..."
links.text: Young religious people protesting the Seraise government, which they consider to be oppressive. It's also got something to do with the encroaching Occidental influences on the local way of life. You have to *not* like a lot of things to set yourself on fire.

links.title: You: "Young people are stupid."
links.text: Young people are stupid.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Yes, especially young people in you..."
links.text: Yes, especially young people in young countries. Anyway, answer the man.

links.title: You: "I wish I was young and on fire."
links.text: I wish I was young and on fire.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "You can still be. There's time. Any..."
links.text: You can still be. There's time. Anyway, answer the man.

links.title: You: "They should be forced to serve in t..."
links.text: They should be forced to serve in the military.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Uhm... they already are. Anyway, an..."
links.text: Uhm... they already are. Anyway, answer the man.

links.title: You: "That's awful. I don't want to think..."
links.text: That's awful. I don't want to think about it anymore. [Ignore thought.]

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Ignorance is bliss, as they say. Go..."
links.text: Ignorance is bliss, as they say. Go ahead, answer the man!

links.title: You: "This is *not* about self-immolation..."
links.text: This is *not* about self-immolation in the Samarskilt AR.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Of course, yes. You were having hea..."
links.text: Of course, yes. You were having health trouble.

links.title: You: ""I feel like you're making fun of m..."
links.text: "I feel like you're making fun of me."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""I'm the most serious person at thi..."
links.text: "I'm the most serious person at this station, detective. Now, do you have any *current, pressing* medical problems?"

links.title: You: ""So you see it too? That my body is..."
links.text: "So you see it too? That my body is to become the last torch in the darkness?"

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""I see third-degree burns and a ref..."
links.text: "I see third-degree burns and a referral to a plastic surgeon whom you won't be able to afford. But that's in the future. Do you have any *current, pressing* medical problems?"

links.title: You: ""The smell of my own flesh cooking...."
links.text: "The smell of my own flesh cooking... I wonder what it would be like..."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Please wonder on your own time. No..."
links.text: "Please wonder on your own time. Now, do you have any *current, pressing* medical problems?"

links.title: You: ""'Cop Sets Fire to Himself.' That w..."
links.text: "'Cop Sets Fire to Himself.' That would be quite an interesting conceptual piece, don't you think?"

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Sounds more like a newspaper headl..."
links.text: "Sounds more like a newspaper headline that will surprise absolutely no one. Now, do you have any *current, pressing* medical problems?"

links.title: You: ""This has been my plan all along. I..."
links.text: "This has been my plan all along. I want to protest the Coalition government."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""From what I can tell, you're just..."
links.text: "From what I can tell, you're just playing into their hands -- disabling yourself from doing any actually useful work. Now, do you have any *current, pressing* medical problems?"

links.title: You: ""How did you know it was me?""
links.text: "How did you know it was me?"

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Didn't. But now I do. How's the dr..."
links.text: "Didn't. But now I do. How's the drinking going?"

links.title: You: ""I decided to stop. Completely. For..."
links.text: "I decided to stop. Completely. Forever."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Great to hear it. Stop by some tim..."
links.text: "Great to hear it. Stop by some time when you're done with your case -- I'll draw some blood, run it through -- let you know how much 'forever' your liver's going to give you."

links.title: You: ""I'm trying really, really hard not..."
links.text: "I'm trying really, really hard not to."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Great. Have a medal. I have an aut..."
links.text: "Great. Have a medal. I have an autopsy to attend to. An autopsy of one Chester McLaine, who died of *fish poisoning*."

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Fucking... I'm not dead, it just h..."
links.text: "Fucking... I'm not dead, it just hurts, okay?"

links.title: You: ""It's going great! I feel like it's..."
links.text: "It's going great! I feel like it's really helping me with this case!"

links.title: You: ""I don't want to talk about this an..."
links.text: "I don't want to talk about this anymore."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Great. I have an autopsy to attend..."
links.text: "Great. I have an autopsy to attend to. An autopsy of one Chester McLaine, who died of *fish poisoning*."

links.title: You: ""I couldn't reach up and grab a tie..."
links.text: "I couldn't reach up and grab a tie from a spinning fan without unbearable pain shooting through my arm."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Hard to tell exactly what it was o..."
links.text: "Hard to tell exactly what it was over the phone. Could be a combination of peripheral neuralgia and high blood pressure. Could be that you were having a heart attack..."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""...or, actually!" He seems to be p..."
links.text: "...or, actually!" He seems to be positively surprised by the idea. "It could be *both*, given your profile."

links.title: You: ""Wait... both? But that sounds bad.""
links.text: "Wait... both? But that sounds bad."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Yup.""
links.text: "Yup."

links.title: You: ""No wonder I'm in so much pain. I f..."
links.text: "No wonder I'm in so much pain. I feel like I've been... damaged."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Yes. Probably in more ways than on..."
links.text: "Yes. Probably in more ways than one."

links.title: Composure: "He sounds very careless about it al..."
links.text: He sounds very careless about it all. Positively breezy.

links.title: Empathy: "You're detecting very little in the..."
links.text: You're detecting very little in the way of empathy from Dr. Gottlieb.

links.title: You: ""I still *feel* pretty good though...."
links.text: "I still *feel* pretty good though. I can probably take a lot of damage."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Yes, positive thinking is a well-k..."
links.text: "Yes, positive thinking is a well-known cure-all. My suggestion is to exercise a lot."

links.title: You: ""So what do I do?""
links.text: "So what do I do?"

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Cut down on the drinking, pal. In..."
links.text: "Cut down on the drinking, pal. In fact, cut *off* the drinking. The drugs too. Anything else?"

links.title: Electrochemistry: "What's he going on about? You know..."
links.text: What's he going on about? You know that speed is great for you. But, shh, don't tell him -- he won't understand.

links.title: Logic: "Abstinence *could* have immediate p..."
links.text: Abstinence *could* have immediate positive effects on your health.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Which reminds me -- when are we fin..."
links.text: Which reminds me -- when are we finally going to get that speed?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Oh, but speed, sweet speed... It go..."
links.text: Oh, but speed, sweet speed... It goes so well with alcohol, too...

links.title: You: ""I think I've developed extreme pho..."
links.text: "I think I've developed extreme photosensitivity..."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""That's because you're hungover --..."
links.text: "That's because you're hungover -- even the radio waves coming from your direction smell like liquor." He pauses. "Do you feel like your eyes are twitching too?"

links.title: You: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""That's the tiny vessels pulsating..."
links.text: "That's the tiny vessels pulsating from high blood pressure, stupid officer. You might be sustaining permanent damage to your vision as we speak. Not much I can do about it. I'm not an *eye* doctor."

links.title: You: ""But... what kind of doctor are you..."
links.text: "But... what kind of doctor are you then?"

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""The busy kind. It's not life-threa..."
links.text: "The busy kind. It's not life-threatening, just annoying. For you. I've got more important things to do here."

links.title: You: "(Lie.) "No.""
links.text: (Lie.) "No."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Good. It would be an awful nuisanc..."
links.text: "Good. It would be an awful nuisance if your experiments with your blood pressure were to cause permanent damage to your vision. A nuisance to you, that is."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "It certainly does not help with aim..."
links.text: It certainly does not help with aiming...

links.title: You: ""I think I've had a heart attack...""
links.text: "I think I've had a heart attack..."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""And you survived it! Congratulatio..."
links.text: "And you survived it! Congratulations. Are you mobile?"

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Sort of. But by god does it *burn*..."
links.text: Sort of. But by god does it *burn* in your chest...

links.title: You: ""Yes...""
Nix Gottlieb: ""Even better! Anything else? I woul..."
links.text: "Even better! Anything else? I wouldn't worry about that. Officers your age have coronary trouble all the time. Also -- death is a natural part of life."

links.title: Volition: "Accept it. The body is an object an..."
links.text: Accept it. The body is an object and objects break down. Do what good you can with yours, before the rest goes too.

links.title: You: ""I've lost my memory. All of it.""
links.text: "I've lost my memory. All of it."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""With all the damage you've been de..."
links.text: "With all the damage you've been dealing yourself with drugs and alcohol, I'm not surprised."

links.title: Authority: "There is no surprise in his voice...."
links.text: There is no surprise in his voice. Only careless superiority.

links.title: You: ""You're not surprised? Okay. Anythi..."
links.text: "You're not surprised? Okay. Anything else?"

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""What else? I'm not a *brain* docto..."
links.text: "What else? I'm not a *brain* doctor. Look on the bright side -- you've got a whole new life now. Use it wisely."

links.title: Drama: "It's hard to say if he doesn't beli..."
links.text: It's hard to say if he doesn't believe you -- or doesn't care.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: ""And then that motherfucker Gottlie..."
links.text: "And then that motherfucker Gottlieb -- reeking of schnapps -- ordered me into his butcher's room..." Officer Fischer is in a storytelling mood -- he continues: "And I ask him, 'You sure, doc?' and he's cool as can be, 'Yeah, if you're in pain, we've gotta get that baby out...'"

links.title: Esprit de Corps: ""...and so he removed my appendix *..."
links.text: "...and so he removed my appendix *on the spot*, while the party was still on in the other room. And I was delirious with pain and all the schnapps I'd had, but I remember thinking -- man, that Gottlieb can stitch..."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: ""Only a month later, when I got a c..."
links.text: "Only a month later, when I got a chance to properly thank him, did I find out that *he* had no recollection of the event -- that's Gottlieb for ya. In league with some devil, he is, I'm sure of it. Cheers!" The clinking of beer glasses is drowned in group conversation...

links.title: You: ""Doc, someone broke my heart.""
links.text: "Doc, someone broke my heart."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Look, pal -- getting *pumped and d..."
links.text: "Look, pal -- getting *pumped and dumped* is not a disease. People live through it all the time. You should be happy for her."

links.title: You: ""Wait... pumped and dumped?""
links.text: "Wait... pumped and dumped?"

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""That's what the guys say, officer...."
links.text: "That's what the guys say, officer. That some chick pumped you -- and then dumped you. Threw you away like an empty juice carton."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Don't take it personally. There jus..."
links.text: Don't take it personally. There just wasn't any *juice* left in your carton, pal.

links.title: You: ""Do you know who this person was, h..."
links.text: "Do you know who this person was, have I told you..."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""You must have me confused for a cl..."
links.text: "You must have me confused for a close personal friend... I am not. I am a medical professional -- with a constant *idiot* emergency on my hands."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "One needs tending to right now, he..."
links.text: One needs tending to right now, he thinks, looking around the room. God, these apes...

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear someone whine in the backg..."
links.text: You hear someone whine in the background. "My eye, doc... my eye..."

links.title: You: ""Doc, someone broke my heart.""
links.text: "Doc, someone broke my heart."

links.title: You: ""I've been shot...""
links.text: "I've been shot..."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Ah, it's you. Walking, talking, th..."
links.text: "Ah, it's you. Walking, talking, though?"

links.title: You: ""Yes, but...""
links.text: "Yes, but..."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Great! How's the drinking going?""
links.text: "Great! How's the drinking going?"

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Great! Any other complaints?""
links.text: "Great! Any other complaints?"

links.title: You: ""I've been bad and I want someone t..."
links.text: "I've been bad and I want someone to abuse me."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Oh, it's you. I know a woman skill..."
links.text: "Oh, it's you. I know a woman skilled at that sort of thing over in Jamrock... but I wouldn't want to inflict you upon her. Best of luck, detective."

links.title: You: ""Isn't there *anything* you can do..."
links.text: "Isn't there *anything* you can do for me?"

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""What, you want me to do blood work..."
links.text: "What, you want me to do blood work for you again, tell you just how bad things really are *across the board*? You want another rundown of everything collapsing inside your body?"

links.title: You: ""Yes. I want the truth!""
links.text: "Yes. I want the truth!"

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""You want the real, honest-to-god t..."
links.text: "You want the real, honest-to-god truth? Stop drinking, eat magnesium and vitamin D. Our station is not a retirement home. We don't have the funds to deal with *rock stars* past their prime."

links.title: Rhetoric: "So it's political! You're being *ne..."
links.text: So it's political! You're being *neglected* because of political reasons...

links.title: Endurance: "The money is probably going to some..."
links.text: The money is probably going to some old, oily...

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""And no, I *don't* want to hear a *..."
links.text: "And no, I *don't* want to hear a *political commentary* on the topic. In fact -- I've got work to do. Some idiot has glued his eyelids shut with Cyanoacrylate. It looks like Mack Torson."

links.title: You: ""No, that doesn't sound like someth..."
links.text: "No, that doesn't sound like something I can handle right now..."

links.title: You: ""I see your point. Might as well ju..."
links.text: "I see your point. Might as well just get back to work."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Do that. I need to go. Some idiot..."
links.text: "Do that. I need to go. Some idiot has glued his eyelids shut with Cyanoacrylate. It *looks* like Mack Torson, but it's hard to say because his eyes are swollen..."

links.title: Mack Torson: ""It's not fucking cryo-actilate......"
links.text: "It's not fucking cryo-actilate... it's super glue, doc."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Cyanoacrylate *is* super glue."
links.text: Cyanoacrylate *is* super glue.

links.title: You: ""I guess that's it for now." [Hang..."
links.text: "I guess that's it for now." [Hang up.]

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Mhphm." The phone clicks. Suddenly..."
links.text: "Mhphm." The phone clicks. Suddenly you hear the already familiar voice...

links.title: Alice: ""Anything else I can help you with,..."
links.text: "Anything else I can help you with, officer?"

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Gottlieb. What'd you get yourself..."
links.text: "Gottlieb. What'd you get yourself into this time?" The question is followed by the sound of someone taking a long drag.

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: "You hear a man clearing his throat..."
links.text: You hear a man clearing his throat briskly, then an answer: "Gottlieb. What'd ya want?"

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "He's carelessly chewing on a piece..."
links.text: He's carelessly chewing on a piece of hard candy.

links.title: You: ""Just a routine check-up.""
links.text: "Just a routine check-up."

links.title: Nix Gottlieb: ""Oh," the man is unpleasantly surpr..."
links.text: "Oh," the man is unpleasantly surprised. "It's you."

links.title: Suggestion: "Was that a snarl or a suppressed gr..."
links.text: Was that a snarl or a suppressed groan? No love for you here.

links.title: You: ""I was told to call the lazareth. P..."
links.text: "I was told to call the lazareth. People are worried about me..."

links.title: You: ""I'm in a bad way, doc. A real *bad..."
links.text: "I'm in a bad way, doc. A real *bad* way."
